mainHero.title: WakeWatch
mainHero.subtitle: Safer driving for everyone.
mainHero.description: Driver drowsiness application powered by computer vision.

items.title: The critical gap in driver safety
items.description: Drowsy driving causes over 100,000 crashes annually and generates $12.5 billion in direct losses globally. Evidence indicates that fatigue is involved in 16â€“20% of crashes across major markets, with approximately 91,000 fatigue-related crashes and 800 deaths annually in the US alone, and comparable figures in Europe and Asia. Actual figures are likely significantly higher due to chronic under-reporting. Despite this documented impact, 97% of drivers lack access to real-time fatigue monitoring systems. Existing telematics and black-box solutions track driving behaviour; speeding, braking patterns, lane adherence, but do not measure whether drivers remain alert, creating a critical blind spot in loss prevention.

items.title: Our solution
items.description: WakeWatch aims to become the global standard for driver fatigue prevention, embedded in every navigation app, rideshare platform, and vehicle system. Professional drivers use it to protect their livelihoods. Fleet operators deploy it to reduce liability and insurance costs. Insurers integrate it to offer risk-based premiums. Ultimately, WakeWatch prevents thousands of drowsy driving accidents annually by making real-time fatigue detection as ubiquitous as seatbelts.

items.name: Real-time Facial Monitoring
items.description: Use your front-facing camera to track eye movements and facial landmarks

items.name: Tiered Alert System
items.description: Visual and gentle audio prompt asking for verbal confirmation with an escalation to a loud alarm and break recommendation if there's no response

items.name: Smart Route Redirection
items.description: Integrates with Google Maps API and automatically suggests nearest rest stops / service stations and other safe pull-over areas

items.name: Simple Trip Tracking
items.description: Start/stop trip functionality with basic logs of alerts triggered per trip

items.name: Lightweight UI
items.description: Minimal interface during active monitoring with one-tap start/stop and clear alert displays

items.name: Background Operation
items.description: App runs while using Google Maps or other navigation apps with overlay permission for alerts
